Package com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.wall

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.wall.Wall
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckerboardWall, HollowWall, SingleWall
public abstract class Wall extends Object
This class handles building walls and interacting with bricks.

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      If there are no bricks left, the level is done.
      Returns:
      if all bricks are broken, return true, otherwise return false.
